record.title: AUTHORIZING THE SPEAKER TO ENTERTAIN MOTIONS TO SUSPEND THE RULES ON TODAY
record.narrative:
AUTHORIZING THE SPEAKER TO ENTERTAIN MOTIONS TO SUSPEND THE RULES ON TODAY -- (House of Representatives - October 03, 2008)

[Page: H10808]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that it be in order today for the Speaker to entertain motions to suspend the rules relating to H.R. 6867.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from New York?
